spec_data.Name: perl-Web-Paste-Simple
spec_data.License: (GPL+ or Artistic) and (GPL+ or Artistic or CC-BY-SA)
spec_data.Description:
Web::Paste::Simple is a lightweight PSGI application for operating
a pastebin-like web site. It provides syntax highlighting via the CodeMirror
JavaScript library. It should be fast enough for deployment via CGI.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:17:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
